title: Better Landing Page! 5.23+ Working!(Sorry for third repost, I keep putting it in the wrong category)
body:
> Changelog:
>   1.0
>       Initial Release
>       Fixed most old links
>       Removed Mangaus (Broken link)
>   2.0 (COMING SOON)
>       New tab script (Better design, faster, etc)
>       (Hopefully) Fix the Lobby page. (Riot pls help me)
>       Updated links for the 2015 age
>       Removed 2006 Links (rip old swag)

 
 Want to see the file used? Check the link above.

Tutorial:
Go to C:\Riot Games\RADS\projects\lol_air_client_oc1\releases\*VERSION*\deploy\
open 'Lol.properties' with notepad++ (http://notepad-plus-plus.org/ )
change 'lobbyLandingURL=blahblahblah' to 'lobbyLandingURL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/yd0vir1288x7eg9/landing.htm?dl=1 '
save file
restart lol
Done! Enjoy custom page. (WIP!!!!)

**_Until 2.0 is released, this content cannot be used! (2.0 Release Date is est. 16th December 2015)_**

replies.body: What is this even about? The dropbox link is down anyways.

I took it down until 2.0 because of copyright issues. (its a dead project idk why he still wants it 'as his own', I even credited him!)

2.0 rewrites the whole thing and then it will be up again. (I'll repost it, I guess.)
